name: Plastic Pirates - UKIE Game Jam 2019
description:
Plastic Pirates was created for the UKIE Green Game Jam on 2020 by four students from the University of East London.

The main idea for this game was to create this educational game to help clear our sea from the rubbish that is floating. The Plastic Pirates are here to help to tackle the issue.

Controls:

1: Using the correct net type, deliver the garbage piles to the appropriate collection point. Move using the WASD keys.

2: Switch between the net types by pressing "F"
Press "Q" or "E" to cast the net on the left or right side respectively.

3: You only have a short amount of time at the start, displayed on the top. Deliver the piles to gain more time, deliver multiple of the same type to gain extra seconds.
